roleset.name: begin

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: `` In order to restore confidence and ensure the support of our principal lenders , '' Mr. Bond said , `` we embarked on fundamantal changes in the structure and direction of the group . ''

propbank.arg: In order to restore confidence and ensure the support of our principal lenders
on fundamantal changes in the structure and direction of the group

roleset.note: EMBARK-V NOTES: Is there also a sense 'get on' or 'depart', as in a travel sense? Ordoes that only occur in the inverse 'disembark'? (from embark.01-v)
